meanings.definition: The teachings, traditions, or practices of the Kabbalah.
meanings.sent1: Studying cabbalisms helps one understand ancient Jewish teachings.
meanings.sent2: She delved into cabbalisms to learn more about Jewish mysticism.
meanings.sent3: The group's discussion on cabbalisms turned into a lively debate.
meanings.sent4: His fascination with cabbalisms was like diving into a hidden world.
meanings.sent5: The cabbalisms revealed a new perspective on spirituality.

meanings.definition: Beliefs or practices related to Jewish mysticism.
meanings.sent1: Many scholars explore cabbalisms to uncover mystical Jewish beliefs.
meanings.sent2: Her interest in cabbalisms led her to study Jewish mysticism.
meanings.sent3: The old book on cabbalisms made him chuckle at its mysterious tone.
meanings.sent4: The cabbalisms were like a secret garden of spiritual wisdom.
meanings.sent5: His eyes sparkled with wonder as he learned about cabbalisms.

meanings.definition: Esoteric or mystical interpretations of religious texts.
meanings.sent1: The professor's lecture on cabbalisms shed light on mystical religious interpretations.
meanings.sent2: They discussed the cabbalisms found in ancient religious texts.
meanings.sent3: The children found a dusty book of cabbalisms and pretended it was a magical spellbook.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was filled with the enchanting cabbalisms she had read.
meanings.sent5: The cabbalisms painted a vivid picture of hidden meanings in the scriptures.
